heading.name: Active Med Count
heading.definition: % of active patients with an active continuous medication count of 0, 1-4, 5-9 or 10+.

indicatorQuery.query: SELECT IF( COUNT(patient) > 0, SUM( IF(patient_status = ${pstatus} AND med_COUNT >= 10,1,0)),0) AS '10+ meds', IF( COUNT(patient) > 0, SUM( IF(patient_status = ${pstatus} AND med_COUNT BETWEEN 5 AND 9, 1, 0)),0) AS '5-9 meds', IF( COUNT(patient) > 0, SUM( IF(patient_status = ${pstatus} AND med_COUNT BETWEEN 1 AND 4, 1, 0)),0) AS '1-4 meds', IF( COUNT(patient) > 0, SUM( IF(patient_status = ${pstatus} AND med_COUNT = 0,1,0)),0) AS '0 meds' FROM ( SELECT d.demographic_no AS patient, d.patient_status, COUNT(DISTINCT meds.regional_identifier) AS med_count FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN( SELECT dr.demographic_no, dr.regional_identifier FROM drugs AS dr WHERE dr.archived = 0 AND dr.regional_identifier IS NOT NULL AND dr.regional_identifier != '' AND rx_date <= NOW() AND (DATE_ADD(dr.rx_date, INTERVAL(DATEDIFF(dr.end_date,dr.rx_date)*1.0) DAY)) >= NOW() ORDER BY dr.demographic_no) meds on (d.demographic_no = meds.demographic_no) where d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} GROUP BY d.demographic_no ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT meds.regional_identifier) DESC ) counts

drillDownQuery.query: SELECT demographic_no, patient_status, counts.med_count FROM (SELECT d.*, COUNT(DISTINCT meds.regional_identifier) AS med_count FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN( SELECT dr.demographic_no, dr.regional_identifier FROM drugs AS dr WHERE dr.archived = 0 AND dr.regional_identifier IS NOT NULL AND dr.regional_identifier != '' AND rx_date <= NOW() AND (DATE_ADD(dr.rx_date, INTERVAL(DATEDIFF(dr.end_date,dr.rx_date)*1.0) DAY)) >= NOW() ORDER BY dr.demographic_no ) meds ON (d.demographic_no = meds.demographic_no) where d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} GROUP BY d.demographic_no ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT meds.regional_identifier) DESC , d.demographic_no ASC ) counts WHERE patient_status=${pstatus} AND med_count > 0
